title: Skin gone???
body:
As i get on today, I decided to play yi. When I went into a game, my project yi skin is not available anymore? My friend gifted it to me, and the other skins he gifted me in the past are not gone. Please help, I want that skin back and my friend is a bit pissd because he payed for the skin

UPDATE: Everything he has gifted me is gone.

replies.body:
Since this is about gifted content, you'll want to reach out to our support specialists in a [ticket request](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look at what happened.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
Sounds like there were issues with your friend's account, likely chargebacks and they had to remove the gifts sent.
